channel.title: [PI] How do I change exp rates?
channel.description:
The title says it all.
My exp rates are too high, how do I change them?

item.title: [PI] How do I change exp rates?
item.dc:creator: @Amayzing Amayzing
item.description:
@Amayzing wrote:

Alright, I think I got it guys, thanks for all of the help.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How do I change exp rates?

item.title: [PI] How do I change exp rates?
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote=“Amayzing, post:2, topic:371889”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=467954.msg3421316#msg3421316 date=1291528372]
Config class, or in skills, in the desired skill class, as well as the Config class.
[/quote]

I searched through config.java and edited the combat exp rates, though how do I change the other skill exp rates?[/quote]

In the appropriate skill class

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How do I change exp rates?

item.title: [PI] How do I change exp rates?
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

still in the same class config.java search for

public static final int WOODCUTTING_EXPERIENCE

after that you should see this

public static final int WOODCUTTING_EXPERIENCE = 34; public static final int MINING_EXPERIENCE = 34; public static final int SMITHING_EXPERIENCE = 34; public static final int FARMING_EXPERIENCE = 34; public static final int FIREMAKING_EXPERIENCE = 35; public static final int HERBLORE_EXPERIENCE = 35; public static final int FISHING_EXPERIENCE = 35; public static final int AGILITY_EXPERIENCE = 35; public static final int PRAYER_EXPERIENCE = 35; public static final int RUNECRAFTING_EXPERIENCE = 35; public static final int CRAFTING_EXPERIENCE = 35; public static final int THIEVING_EXPERIENCE = 35; public static final int SLAYER_EXPERIENCE = 30; public static final int COOKING_EXPERIENCE = 35; public static final int FLETCHING_EXPERIENCE = 35;
and just change them to what you want

Read full topic
